intro: Lomandra altior, commonly known as the tall leek lomandra, is a perennial evergreen herb native to eastern Australia. Lomandra altior is adapted to well-drained soils and is drought-tolerant, making it suitable for rock gardens and native plant landscapes. It also plays a role in supporting local wildlife, including birds and insects.
